name: The Test Centre
description:
This is a game developed during the second MQ game jam of 2022 with the theme of reboot. The game was developed by a team of 3.

During this game the player will go down different paths and when they reach the end it is time to reboot the game and maybe something might change

The controls for this game is

Space - Jump

Mouse - Camera

WASD - Movement

ESC - quit the game

Press c while in game and then exit to reset the unlocked gates (make sure youre at the checkpoint at the center of the map tho i didnt have time to make a proper reset mechanic its 5 am for gods sake let me rest)

mac build might not work i didnt test it but summits mac build always breaks when downloaded via itch 

Third party assets used for this project:

Unity Starter assets

some glitch shader i found on the internet (Link to source incoming)
